text: (anta nalin) vetanaiyaik kanumpotukalrrkalra aniyayam ceyta ovvor atmavum, atanitam ulakattilulla porutkal ellame iruntiruntalum avai anaittaiyume (tanakkup) parikaramakak kotuttuvita natum; tan kaicetattaiyum, kalivirakkattaiyum velippatuttum; anal (annalil) avaiyitaiye niyayamakave tirppalikkappatum - (oru ciritum) avarrukku aniyayam ceyyappata mattatu
